segments.text: I'm observing two children in this bustling kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy is precariously balanced on a stool, reaching for something in a cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His legs are splayed, and the stool looks incredibly unstable; I'm quite fearful he'll fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Oh, I see it now, he's reaching into a "COOKIE JAR" in the upper cabinet!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's holding a plate, probably to catch his stolen treasures.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl beside him is reaching up with an expectant, open palm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are definitely in cahoots, secretly acquiring cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's actually a bit heartwarming to see their teamwork, despite the naughtiness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm a little angry that they're being so sneaky, though.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is quite the elaborate heist they've planned.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool could tip over at any moment, creating a huge mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't get hurt or break anything valuable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their focus is entirely on those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR
